content.rendered:
Beautiful Product Reviews, Photo Video Reviews and Referrals

Loox is a fully-featured product review app that enables brands of all sizes to automatically collect customer reviews with photos & videos and beautifully display happy customer content.

With Loox, you can collect Photo & Video Reviews, generate traffic and referral, enjoy a first-class user interface with beautiful looking widgets and many more.

Benefits:

  • Built-in Loox integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust Loox widget to theme structure

Promotion offer:

  • 30 days of free trial

Awesome Plan includes all features – only 9.99 USD/month. For BullTheme users, the first 30 days are free

Condition of participation:

Users first time install Loox via BullTheme’s referral link

App details
Get promotions
